It could have been a great game. But the cheaters and the community are just awful. And here it is not only about the people, but also about the Valve Corporation, who abandoned this game and are only sucking money through it. There are so many things that can be improved to make playing more comfortable, but we will not see this anymore. We will wait for the next counter strike series to be released. I've been playing the Counter Strike franchise since 1999, CS:GO is my favorite shooting game by a mile. Simple game but packs a lot of fun. There's no feeling in life quite like getting an Ace against an enemy competitive team. This is the only game that can make me feel furious in one round and overwhelmed with joy the next round. Might be a tough game to get into for beginners. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a well established shooting game.

Overall 4.5/5 only because the community can be toxic at times, otherwise the game is great.
